QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship Extension Insert Log Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays records from the Sponsorship Extension Insert Log
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select soc.ID, QUERYTYPENAME, soc.[NAME], so.LOOKUPID, initial.[DESCRIPTION] as 'INITIALDESCRIPTION', currStatus.[DESCRIPTION], CONVERSIONDATE, DAYSTOCONVERT from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION_INSERT_LOG_04_2015 join dbo.USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE initial on initial.ID = INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE currStatus on currStatus.ID = CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on soc.ID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = soc.ID

common:TranslationListOption.Value: Prospect Transfer with Blank Table PT2
Reassign appeal with Blank Table PT2
Unpaid Conversion with Blank Table PT2
